page.title: 03LANDSCAPE AND BUILDINGS 2
page.content:
Landscape and Buildings 2
The next largest village in our survey is New Ellerby. This village was built near to the railway line that went from Hull to Hornsea. The railway line was closed in 1966 but you can still use the railway track for a pleasant walk. Like Withernwick there used to be a wind mill in New Ellerby. Part of the mill can still be seen behind Mill House. On the main road there is a Methodist Chapel and a Post Office.The population of the parish of Ellerby is 350 but this includes the village of Old Ellerby.
